workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Remove Oracle Database software and delete Oracle Database 23ai

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup compute instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Delete an Oracle Database
tutorials.description: Only delete the database from your host but retain Oracle Database software and Oracle home.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Deinstall Oracle Database and remove Oracle home
tutorials.description: How to remove Oracle Database software and delete Oracle Database and its components from your host.

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to common problems and directions for receiving live help
